text: The 1970 Volta a Catalunya was the 50th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 10 September to 18 September 1970. The race started in Manresa and finished in Barcelona. It was won by Franco Bitossi. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 05" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 21" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 28" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 41" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 19" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 52" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 42" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 56" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 05" |} |} ==References== 1970 Volta Category:1970 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1970 sports events in Europe
